Journal Story: Going to REI in Jacksonville to take a prep class they are offering on the AT.. Can also see about getting the proper fitting pack there too..
Testing, testing... learning to blog here..

Still have not completely figured out how to build my blog here.. My photo didn't load and I have some entries that only include my trail name. I will keep working on it as I will keep on dreaming of hiking the trail in 2017. Aside from that, I am thoroughly enjoying reading the journals of those already on it...

Hey, to the person who emailed and asked about the class I mentioned, it said not to reply to the email and you left no name, so I will reply here.. I too am on REI's wait list.. When I do take it I will be happy to share any info I think others would be interested to hear.. Good luck with your preparations, Friend..   Flit

Found his 1965 trail journal on here and thought this was a good quote for me personally.. I will be a few weeks shy of 59 if all goes as planned when I set off on the AT... All the inspiration I can find is going to be wonderful method of getting my mental mindset primed.  Advice to older hikers on hard climbs."Stop now and then for a heart beat or two.But never stop long. A minute will do."Earl Shaffer
